title: PerformAction event Description
description: Description schema for the perform_action category

category.description: A string that describes the nature of this action. It should match that passed into FleetUpdateHandle::add_performable_action()

description.description: Additional information that will be passed along to the action executor.

unix_millis_action_duration_estimate.description: (Recommended) The estimated duration for this action

use_tool_sink.description: (Optional) Whether the tool on the robot will be powered during the action. Default to false

expected_finish_location.description: (Optional) A place that the robot will end up after the action. Default to last known location
